text: @CP24 #alcoholawareness Wonder why Ontario,Canada has a serious drinking problem,look no further than their Health Minister, 'Under the influence"-For our mental and physical health,and wellbeing, including #COVID19-Avoid Alcohol consumption! We all must do our part,Christine Elliott!
